item.title: Imoptimal – Official WordPress.org Theme
item.dc:creator: Ivan Maljukanović
item.description:
Description: Simplistic theme, with an option (available inside of admin menu, at Appearance/Customize) to enable users to build their whole website either through: a) Widgets – best if used with Pagebuilder by Siteorigin plugin, and its widgets bundle; b) Elementor – most popular website builder plugin. Intended for technically advanced users that build their own […]

The post Imoptimal – Official WordPress.org Theme appeared first on imoptimal.

item.title: Custom WordPress Musical Theme
item.dc:creator: Ivan Maljukanović
item.description:
Description: Responsive website made for a musical group. Challenge: Creating a multimedia rich website, with one clear goal in mind – to funnel their online traffic from all of the social media they used (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube), and to establish online presence for their production company. Design and functionality of the website based on my […]

item.title: Custom WordPress website for an accounting company
item.dc:creator: Ivan Maljukanović
item.description:
Description: Responsive website made for an accounting and consulting company. Challenge: Creating a full website design from scratch (logo design included), without much guidelines. The goal was to create content rich website that attracts potential clients with all of the latest news/regulation postings in accounting. Website also needed to be easily maintainable for the administrator […]
